title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5702.2 - Insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5702.2 - Insurance

State Regulations

In addition to the certificate of emergency transport, responsible State or Federal agencies and the carrier shall submit for the
authority's prior approval evidence of proper insurance coverage and/or an
acceptable indemnification and hold harmless agreement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5702.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
